name: Alien Fighter
description:
A simple but very addicting concept. Blast all the alien baddies until your ship is no more! 

To start the game, press any key. Each time you reset by pressing "R" you will also need to press a key until the game starts back up.

CONTROLS

Left/Right Arrow: Move

Spacebar:  Shoot

R: Reset 

ENTER: Pause/Unpause

S: Spawn Alien

F: Fullscreen Mode

W: Windowed Mode (Default) 

ESC: Exit Game

CHEAT CODE

Hold  "C" and press "Shift" for infinite health!
